National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons ( NAPTIP ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu nke gọọmentị etiti Naijiria hibere na afọ 2003 iji luso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na mmegide ikike mmadụ ndị ọzọ yiri ya
NAPTIP bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru nlekọta nke Federal Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs, Disaster Management and Social Development

E hiwere NAPTIP n'okpuru iwu gọọmentị etiti na Julaị 14, 2003  site na iwu ịzụ ahịa mmadụ (mmachibido iwu) nke Enforcement na Administration Act (2003)  sitere na nkwado nke ndị Women Trafficking and Child Labour Eradication Foundation (WOTCLEF).
NAPTIP nwere ikike ịmanye iwu ịzụ ahịa mmadụ (Mgbochi) nke Enforcement na Administration Act (TIPPEA) na Nigeria
Iji hụ na arụru ọrụ ịlụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ nke ọma, ụlọ ọrụ a nwere ngalaba na nkeji ndị a:
Ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere iwu zonal 9 dị na Lagos, Benin, Enugu, Uyo, Sokoto, Maiduguri, Oshogbo, na Makurdi
Ụlọ ọrụ a na ndi otu na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-ejikọ aka ị rụ na steeti dị iche iche

Na 2013, NAPTIP malitere mmekorita  ya na ndị Devatop Center for Africa Development, otu ndị ntorobịa  na-eduzi ndị na-emegide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, iji zụọ na inye ndị ntorobịa ike ịlụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na Nigeria ọgụ, yana nyocha ikpe na ịzọpụta ndị ọ metụtara
NAPTIP na-arụkọkwa ọrụ yana Network nke CSOs Against Child Trafficking, Abuse and Labour, Women Trafficking and Child Labor Eradication Foundation, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
NAPTIP rịọrọ ka akwalitekwuo nkwado sitere na aka Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC,  ka were nwe ike ikpochapụ izụ ahịa mmadụ na ihe nsonazụ na-emebi onyinyo Nigeria
Arịrịọ a sitere n'aka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Imaan Sulaiman-Ibrahim
Kemgbe ọ malitere, ụlọ ọrụ a akpụkpula ma makwa  mmadu 331  ikpe na ihe gbasara ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, site na ọnwa nke Septemba 2017
Site n'agbata afọ 2003 na 2017, NAPTIP agbapụtala ihe karịrị mmadụ 3000

Ụlọ ọrụ a na-ebute ụzọ n'ịgbapụta na imezigharị ndị Naijiria si Libya,  site n'enyemaka nke Gọọmenti etiti, Ụlọ Ọrụ Mba Ụwa nke Migration, na ụlọ ọrụ ndi mba ụwa ọzọ, nke nwere ịja mma otuto  site na United States.
